file_content.text: At last, the time has come to take the Eternal Throne.
It's showtime, folks. I hope you're ready to take a throne.
This is it, people. The day we secure the Eternal Throne.
Empress Vaylin has fallen. In her absence, the Eternal Fleet rampages across known space, threatening to wipe out all life in the galaxy.
We've got to shut them down. The only question is "how?"
Valkorion said the throne is the only way to stop them.
As loathe as I am to trust him, our data supports his claim.
The warships obey one master: the Eternal Throne.
Seize the throne, and you will assume command of the fleet. Only then can we end their rampage.
The throne won't fall without a fight. What kind of resistance can we expect?
Tell me about the defenses.
The Eternal Empire will try to stop us with everything it has.
If we destroy the throne, we may be able to stop this crisis in its tracks.
What if we destroy the throne?
We can't risk its destruction while the fleet runs rampant.
Destroy the throne, and you condemn the galaxy to death.
It's simply too much of a risk while the fleet runs rampant.
When the fleet begins its next rampage, it will be under my command. I can hardly wait.
I want the fleet.
One rampage at a time, Commander.
They have Zakuul heavily blockaded. Warships appear to be protecting the throne.
Which includes bombing the Spire into oblivion.
Which includes bombarding the Spire, with no regard for life.
The fleet's ravaging the city, and no ship can break their blockade. Not even to flee for safety.
This ship's fortified with upgrades from Iokath. If any vessel can punch through, we can.
The Gravestone can break it.
I'll reroute some juice to our shields and cross all my fingers.
If I reroute all power to shields, we might crack that blockade.
We've survived a skirmish with the Eternal Fleet before, and we'll survive again. We'll just need to think on our feet.
We'll have to improvise.
You know the Eternal Fleet better than anyone, Arcann. How do we break their blockade?
Arcann. We need your insight.
You don't. The fleet was built on technology beyond anything in the Alliance.
Anything but the Gravestone. A few tweaks to the shields, and we may smash right through.
Except my favorite ship. If I reroute power to the Gravestone's shields, we'll crack that blockade.
The longer the fleet hammers Zakuul, the easier it will be to conquer.
The more carnage, the better.
I hate to say it, but you have a point.
There will be no world to conquer if we can't get past the fleet.
You're talking about our home. Millions of innocent people...
Who will all die if we can't break through the Eternal Fleet.
Iokath's upgrades might be enough to smash the blockade.
Those Iokath upgrades boosted our shields--maybe enough to crack the blockade.
It's our best hope. Do it.
Once we exit hyperspace, you will drop near your target: the tower of the Eternal Throne.
While we're gunning for the throne, an Alliance strike team will hit Overwatch--and buy us some time.
Once we exit hyperspace, we will drop you near the tower.
While you're gunning for the throne, Lana and I will hit Overwatch--and buy you some time.
Then it's settled. When do we reach Zakuul?
Now.
Shield upgrades are ready for action. It's now or never.
Now.
Shields up. It's been nice knowing you, Commander.
Break that blockade.
Punch it.
Haha!
Woohooo!
Everyone, to your battle stations! For the Alliance!
Fight with honor, Commander. If anything happens to me, know I died thinking of you.
I won't lose you, Torian.
[Kiss Torian]
Then today's a good day for someone else to die. Come back alive, cyar'ika.
Hey. You're Torian Cadera: Mandalorian hero and the bravest warrior I know. No one's taking you down today.
[Inspire Torian]
If I'm brave, it's because you give me strength. Come back alive, cyar'ika.
Welp, this is the big one. Take care of yourself, all right? I'd get bored without you!
Don't worry, Vette.
[Kiss Vette]
I've got more where that came from. Let's hurry up and win this thing.
When the dust settles, I will be sitting on the throne with you at my side.
[Inspire Vette]
With full access to Vaylin's treasury. Think about it. This war can't go on forever...
Commander. If everything goes right, I'll see you on the other side.
Good luck, major.
[Kiss Jorgan]
The best luck I could ask for. Be safe.
The Eternal Empire's not going down without a fight. I'm counting on you, major.
[Inspire Jorgan]
I won't let you down. Good luck securing that throne.
A hundred credits says I bag more Skytroopers than you.
Never change, Kaliyo.
[Kiss Kaliyo]
You're in, double or nothing. Haha...
I'll accept those terms, with one revision. Loser makes breakfast. For a month.
[Inspire Kaliyo]
I like my toast like I like my Skytroopers: burnt to a crisp.
We've been through a lot, but this... Let's hope fate's on our side.
When I've got you in my corner, who needs fate?
[Kiss Koth]
You sure know how to cheer a guy up. Stay safe, Commander.
Fate's always on our side, Koth. Now let's win this battle--for Zakuul, and for each other.
[Inspire Koth]
That's a cause I can get behind. Stay safe, Commander.
Commander... If anything happens to me, it was worth every moment I've spent with you.
I love you, Lana.
[Kiss Lana]
You taste of adrenaline. It suits you.
You're not going anywhere, Lana. I need you--as my advisor, my friend, and my partner.
[Inspire Lana]
And I need you. More than I'll ever admit.
Hey, lovebirds. Escape pod's waiting.
Zakuul, here we come.
Whatever happens down there, I just wanted to say... I love you.
I love you too, Theron.
[Kiss Theron]
You're going to look great sitting on that throne.
We're going to get through this... together. I'm counting on you to liven up my coronation party.
[Inspire Theron]
Get enough Corellian ale in me, and I'll dance everyone under the table.
It's time, you two. The escape pod's ready and waiting.
Our escape pod's ready and waiting.
Zakuul, here we come.
We will join your fight, Outlander.
I started this war. Now, I'll help you end it.
Let's take the throne and save your homeworld.
Glad to hear it.
Valkorion knows your weaknesses. He may try to exploit them... and destroy you.
Beware Valkorion.
If Father shows himself, we will be ready.
For Zakuul.
For the Alliance!
I shouldn't have to say this, but don't even think about stealing the throne out from under me.
Don't cross me.
You're right. You did not have to say it.
Lead the way, Outlander. Today we fight for Zakuul!
We'll get through this--together. Besides, I'm counting on you to liven up our victory celebration.
[Inspire Theron]
The fleet will stop at nothing to protect the throne. No ship can break their blockade. Not even to flee for safety.
Problem is, those warships are blockading Zakuul--and bombing the city to rubble.
There's only one way to stop them: we must seize the throne.
We will join your fight, Commander.
Lead the way, Commander. Today we fight for Zakuul!
